0.cdata!:
Burundi - Projet d'amelioration de
            la culture du café arabica

docna.cdata!:
Burundi - Coffee Improvement Project :
            Credit 0147  - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Burundi - Coffee Improvement
            Project : Credit 0147  - Credit Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would concern a
            selected 4,400 ha area and 44,000 smallholders in the heart
            of the coffee-growing region of Burundi, and would be
            carried out over a period of 5 years. It would consist in
            the implementation of a program of fertilizer trials and the
            establishment of a fertilizer sales program; the provision
            of farm inputs and tools to participating farmers; the
            construction of four pulping and fermenting factories and
            the improvement of existing pulping centers; the improvement
            of coffee tracks; and the financing of extension services
            which would also provide in-service training for Burundi
            coffee extension and processing personnel. OCIBU, a
            government agency responsible for coffee development, would
            carry out the project on behalf of the government.
